summary: A utility that spawns multiple instances of the same Python script on a single compute node, configuring each child with appropriate distributed‑training environment variables (local rank, master address/port, node rank, world size) so that they can cooperate in a multi‑GPU, multi‑node job.
business_intent: Enable seamless launch of parallel processes for distributed machine‑learning workloads, abstracting the boilerplate of subprocess creation and environment setup required for coordinated training across GPUs and nodes.
